title: J-FONT : best match for TIMES NEW ROMAN ???
content:
Hello,

To those who know quite a lot about Japanese fonts, I'm asking this question : according to you, what is the Japanese font that would look good when placed close to some Times New Roman?

The ones I've chosen are :  
- DFGyoSho-Lt-WIN-RKSJ-H  
- DFHS-Mincho-W7-WIN-RKSJ-H

What do you think about this choice?  
Do you have a better idea?

Thanks ! :)
author: sleidia
